attributes.action: Legislate to make Bitcoin legal tender in the UK
attributes.background: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are going to be the currencies of the future.  We need to move towards the standard before we are left behind.

rejection.details:
Legal tender is only applicable in very limited circumstances. You can find out more here:

https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/knowledgebank/what-is-legal-tender
